name: instagram-comment-lead-intelligence
description: AI-powered lead generation from Instagram comments with intent detection and quality scoring.

scripts.postbuild: node --input-type=module -e "import{existsSync as e}from'node:fs';if(!e('./dist/index.js')){console.error('FATAL: dist/index.js not generated. Check tsconfig.json rootDir/outDir.');process.exit(1)}else{console.log('Build OK: dist/index.js verified')}"

author: Apify Developer
